title: Johnstown Flood National Memorial: Schedule Of Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Schedule Of Events              Schedule Of Events           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Johnstown Flood National Memorial A Journey Around Lake Conemaugh Van Tour      Location: Meet at the Visitor Center, Johnstown Flood National Memorial Fees: Included with Park Admission     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/04/2016 to 09/25/2016 Join us for a van tour around what once was Lake Conemaugh.  View Details      Johnstown Flood National Memorial Evening on the Lake: Art and the National Parks      Location: Johnstown Flood National Memorial Visitor Center Theatre Fees: Free!     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Explore the intimate connection between art and the National Parks. View Details      Johnstown Flood National Memorial Path of the Flood Van Tour      Time: 1:00 PM Location: Johnstown Flood National Memorial Fees: FREE!     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Join a Park Ranger for a van tour of the path of the Flood.
